s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon Basics (formerly written as AmazonBasics) is a private label that offers home goods, office supplies, and tech accessories. The line was launched in 2009. s: January 6, 2023 - These brands were not developed by Amazon from scratch. They were co-opted. They may be native to Amazon (via Launchpad), recruited by Amazon, or assimilated via Accelerator. Their products are sold exclusively on Amazon in exchange for the usual fees and a 5%-7% premium.

t: Amazon Private Label Brands - Marketplace Pulse
s: March 18, 2019 - According to Marketplace Pulse research, Amazon-owned private label brands are not nearly as successful as many paint them to be. Amazon has been successful in creating generic items at low prices, but only when using the Amazon brand name (i.e., AmazonBasics and Amazon Essentials).
